Model

Class ParserClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.ParserClass

  • public class ParserClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for parsing output that comes from making YR.no API requests.

      java.util.ArrayList<Forecast> parse2YR(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
      Parses the data retrieved from a "LocationForecast" API request made to YR.no into a List of Forecast objects that represents the retrieved weather data

      Parses places.xml for latitude,longitude and name of a place/city.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParserClass

        public ParserClass()

    • Method Detail

      • parsePlacesXML

        public LocationForecast[] parsePlacesXML()
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Parses places.xml for latitude,longitude and name of a place/city. This is later used as input to the API-requests as only the locations specified in places.xml are valid locations for a weather forecast
        Returns:
        Array of LocationsForecast objects. These contain the name and coordinates for a location.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • parse2YR

        public java.util.ArrayList<Forecast> parse2YR(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Parses the data retrieved from a "LocationForecast" API request made to YR.no into a List of Forecast objects that represents the retrieved weather data
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Forecast objects. These contain the weather data at a specific time.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
